name: Bicycle Racing Craze: Drive & Race On Bike Tracks
name_original: Bicycle Racing Craze: Drive & Race On Bike Tracks
description:
Enough with mindless motocycle racings, ride on the bicycle now, fast paddle to not only get fit but to win this cycle race with professionals. Game is designed with professional cycle racing gear, environemnt and bicycle look is professional. Ride the bike and surmount the racing tracks while keep paddling fast. Game has mountain bikes, normal racing bikes and other professional bikes.

How to race bicycles

-> Tap to driver
-> tapping fast to get the speed
-> keep taping to get faster and faster
